name: HeartFailureCHF_LOINC
title: Heart Failure (CHF)_LOINC
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for CHF Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute CHF Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: CHF Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: CHF LOINC Codes that constitute the CHF Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

Did your heart failure prevent you from living as you wanted during the past month (4 weeks) by making your walking about or climbing stairs difficult [MLHFQ]
Did your heart failure prevent you from living as you wanted during the past month (4 weeks) by making your working around the house or yard difficult [MLHFQ]
